member.name: M:TechnicalTestAPI.Controllers.ShiftManagerController.GetShiftsCountByPersonName(System.String)
member.summary: name as input and returns the total number of shifts assigned to that person.

member.name: M:TechnicalTestAPI.Controllers.ShiftManagerController.GetShiftAllocationByRole
member.summary: returns an array of role and the total number of shifts assigned to that role in descending order.

member.name: M:TechnicalTestAPI.Controllers.ShiftManagerController.GetLocations
